Ingredients.1: 1 (20 ounce) package white almond bark, cut into small chunks

Ingredients.2: 2 (3.25 ounce) packages butter-flavored puffed corn (such as Puffcorn®)

Ingredients.3: 1 tablespoon multicolored candy sprinkles, or as needed

Directions.1: Place almond bark into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high power until melted, about 4 minutes, stopping every 30 seconds to stir.

Directions.2: Place puffed corn into a large bowl and pour smooth and melted almond bark on top. Toss puffed corn to evenly distribute almond bark.

Directions.3: Distribute the colored sprinkles evenly over the puffed corn. Allow to cool before storing.
